H0.text: Which group recorded the 90s albums 'Nevermind' and 'In Utero'. Pearl Jam

H1.text: Which group recorded the 90s albums 'Nevermind' and 'In Utero'. Foo Fighters

H2.text: Which group recorded the 90s albums 'Nevermind' and 'In Utero'. Soundgarden

H3.text: Which group recorded the 90s albums 'Nevermind' and 'In Utero'. NIRVANA

A4.text: Nirvana found unexpected mainstream success with 'Smells Like Teen Spirit', the first single from its landmark second album, Nevermind (1991).

A5.text: the band released its highly anticipated third studio album, In Utero (1993).
